channel.title: I'm a noob please help me?
channel.description:
can someone post a tut. or tell me where i can find a tut for making commands/how to spawn npcs
if you could that would be nice, i would pay for a tut but i'm like dead poor on my paypal :(

Keep making a fool out of yourself, it’s very immusing. I wonder what a brilliant sentence you’ll come up with next?

shob you need to shit the fuck up, you think you own the forums or something? dont tell people to fuck off bro…all he did was ask a question so you can kiss my ass you stupid fat fuck

item.source: I'm a noob please help me?

item.title: I'm a noob please help me?
item.dc:creator: @_Kyle ~Kyle
item.description:
@_Kyle wrote:

[quote=“Dark Anima, post:22, topic:230075”][quote author=Rs Classic link=topic=302796.msg2430954#msg2430954 date=1220858414]

oh, I’m glad to see that the good old forums are still the same.
you need to get yourselves a girl, guys.

what comes to the question, as I recall you create commands in your commandhandler.java
you should be able to copy+paste your way to brand new commands without knowing anything about java, with a bit of reason.
nevertheless I don’t think that RSC is a good thing to start your programming career with, you might want to to through some basic java tutorials first.

This one should be fun, you even get to move a ball there!
http://javaboutique.internet.com/tutorials/Java_Game_Programming/

Then you might want to use BlueJ, it’s a tool that will create applet codes, batch files etc for you, so you will only have to write the classes, and actually it provides a little help with them as well.
http://www.bluej.org/

There, that should get your started on your journey to a programmer
May the force be with you.

Time to get a girl, If I’m right I got 2 girls, unlike the fat prostitute you have sitting in your room.
Just because you think everyone here is a “nerd” they actually aren’t, for me for example I code C++,Java,Html, and that doesn’t mean you aren’t a nerd and cant get a girlfriend. I don’t even look like a so called “nerd” but I code because I enjoy doing it in the spare time I have.
Also never copy and paste, I hate it.
[/quote]

Now you completely misunderstood me. Saying “You need to get yourselves a girl guys”, didn’t have anything to do with anyone being nerdy or anything, I spend a lot of time on my PC programming as well.
What I was referring to, is this same neverending topic flaming, spamming, acting like a 13 years old(and most of time being one too). In my time there were Zilla, RscCoder… Now there’s just different names, but it’s all the same.

My sincere apoligies if I hurt your feelings, I didn’t realize that someone might misunderstand my post.
Nothing personal.
May the force be with you.

EDIT: Oh, and good going with the 2 girls[/quote]
Acting like a thirteen year old?
Im thirteen you douchebag.

Read full topic

There, that should get your started on your journey to a programmer

Also never copy and paste, I hate it.[/quote]

Now you completely misunderstood me. Saying “You need to get yourselves a girl guys”, didn’t have anything to do with anyone being nerdy or anything, I spend a lot of time on my PC programming as well.
What I was referring to, is this same neverending topic flaming, spamming, acting like a 13 years old(and most of time being one too). In my time there were Zilla, RscCoder… Now there’s just different names, but it’s all the same.

My sincere apoligies if I hurt your feelings, I didn’t realize that someone might misunderstand my post.
Nothing personal.
May the force be with you.

EDIT: Oh, and good going with the 2 girls
